summary: This FBI 302 document records an introductory video conference meeting held on February 23, 2021, between the case team and Eva Dubin, a potential witness. Dubin, accompanied by her attorney, was introduced to the investigators, expressed willingness to cooperate, and acknowledged her memory of past events was not the best. The meeting was to set up a future formal interview.

events.title: Introductory Video Conference with Eva Dubin
events.description: The case team held an introductory video conference meeting with potential witness Eva Dubin and her attorney to introduce the team and discuss future cooperation.

locations: New York, New York, United States
keyFacts: Eva Dubin, a potential witness, was introduced to the case team investigating the Epstein matter via video conference.
Dubin expressed her willingness to cooperate with the investigation but stated her memory of experiences from a long time ago was 'not the best'.
The meeting was introductory, with the intent to schedule a future interview date for a formal statement.
